synopsis.text:
Young Ikta Solork, a self-proclaimed lazy womanizer with a deep-seated hatred for war, finds himself reluctantly thrust into the heart of a raging conflict between the formidable Katvarna Empire and the neighboring Kioka Republic. As he embarks on the path towards becoming a high-ranking military officer, Ikta crosses paths with an eclectic mix of individuals, including his childhood friend Yatorishino Igsem, the dedicated nurse trainee Harouma Beckle, the steadfast Mashuu Tetrijirch from the old military faction, and the skilled Torwey Lemion.

Despite his initial reluctance, Ikta's exceptional intellect and unparalleled strategic prowess propel him to the forefront of the war, earning him the prestigious title of Grand Commandant. As the flames of war continue to engulf the world around him, Ikta must navigate the treacherous battlefield and rely on his wits to not only survive but to ultimately secure victory for the Katvarna Empire. Little does he know that his dreams of a peaceful, carefree life will be put on hold, as he is forced to embrace his newfound role as a hero and a beacon of hope amidst the chaos of war.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
